revised_title: Marsupial Male: A Role Model for Understanding Sexual Development
tldr: This article explores the similarities and differences in male sexual development between marsupial and eutherian mammals, focusing on the marsupial male as a role model for understanding sexual development. It discusses the development of the gonad and associated ducts, primordial germ cell migration, and the role of genes and hormones in directing sexual differentiation.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
